local_intent: Compute and verify a top grasp pose for the bread after ensuring it is detected and locally aligned.
assumptions: Bread is detectable within three attempts.
Local approach/align is feasible without collision.
ComputeGraspPose will publish the pose under the key 'grasp_bread'.
coherence_with_global: Mirrors the global sequence around ComputeGraspPose: detect -> align -> compute grasp pose with result_key 'grasp_bread' -> verify pose available. Uses same key that is later consumed by GraspAtPose.
